properties.name: application.pagination.enabled
properties.description: Default: false </br>Whether or not to enable Pagination

properties.name: application.pagination.first-and-last-rels
properties.description: Default: false </br>Whether or not to force First and Last page's link in case of single page result set

properties.name: application.pagination.default-page-size
properties.description: Default: 16 </br>Default page size

properties.name: application.pagination.max-page-size
properties.description: Default: 2000 </br>Maximum page size to refrain any memory issues

properties.name: application.pagination.page-param-name
properties.description: Default: page </br>Page number request parameter name

properties.name: application.pagination.page-param-description
properties.description: Description of page parameter name visible in swagger

properties.name: application.pagination.size-param-name
properties.description: Default: size </br>Page size request parameter name

properties.name: application.pagination.size-param-description
properties.description: Page size request parameter description visible in swagger

properties.name: application.pagination.sort-param-name
properties.description: Default: sort </br>Sort request parameter name

properties.name: application.pagination.sort-param-description
properties.description: Sort request parameter description visible in swagger

properties.name: application.cors.allowed-origin-patterns
properties.description: Alternative to allowed-origins that supports origins declared via wildcard patterns

properties.name: application.cors.allowed-origins
properties.description: The list of origins for which cross-origin requests are allowed. </br>Values may be a specific domain, or the CORS defined special value '*' for all origins

properties.name: application.cors.allowed-methods
properties.description: The list of the HTTP methods to allow, e.g. 'GET', 'POST' etc.

properties.name: application.cors.allowed-headers
properties.description: The list of headers that a pre-flight request can list as allowed for use during an actual request. </br>The special value '*' allows actual requests to send any header.

properties.name: application.cors.exposed-headers
properties.description: The list of response headers other than simple headers </br>i.e. 'Cache-Control', 'Content-Language', 'Content-Type', 'Expires', 'Last-Modified', or 'Pragma' that an actual response might have and can be exposed.

properties.name: application.cors.allow-credentials
properties.description: Whether user credentials are supported. </br>By default this is not set (i.e. user credentials are not supported).

properties.name: application.cors.max-age
properties.description: How long, as a duration, the response from a pre-flight request can be cached by clients. </br>In numeric format such as 1800 or java.time.Duration format such as 10s

properties.name: application.swagger.enabled
properties.description: Whether or not to enable Swagger

properties.name: application.swagger.title
properties.description: API title

properties.name: application.swagger.description
properties.description: API description

properties.name: application.swagger.version
properties.description: API version

properties.name: application.swagger.terms-of-service-url
properties.description: API terms and conditions

properties.name: application.swagger.contact-name
properties.description: API contact name

properties.name: application.swagger.contact-url
properties.description: API contact url

properties.name: application.swagger.contact-email
properties.description: API contact email id

properties.name: application.swagger.license
properties.description: API license

properties.name: application.swagger.license-url
properties.description: API license URL

properties.name: application.swagger.use-default-response-messages
properties.description: Whether or not to use default response messages in Swagger

properties.name: application.swagger.host
properties.description: API host

properties.name: application.swagger.protocols
properties.description: List of protocols: HTTP, HTTPS

properties.name: application.swagger.default-group.enabled
properties.description: Whether or not to create Docket for default group

properties.name: application.swagger.default-group.name
properties.description: Name of default group Docket

properties.name: application.swagger.default-group.inclusion-pattern
properties.description: A List of patterns for APIs to be included in default group

properties.name: application.swagger.default-group.exclusion-pattern
properties.description: A List of patterns for APIs to be excluded from default group

properties.name: application.problem.enabled
properties.description: Whether or not to enable Problem handling

properties.name: application.problem.debug-info
properties.description: Whether or not to include debug-info such as stacktrace and message codes etc. in exception response messages

properties.name: application.security.enabled
properties.description: Whether or not to enable security

properties.name: application.security.unsecured-uris
properties.description: A List of URI patterns to be excluded from security i.e. making them unsecured

properties.name: application.email.enabled
properties.description: Whether or not to enable emails

properties.name: application.email.templates-location
properties.description: Thymeleaf templates location

properties.name: application.email.reply-to
properties.description: "Reply to" email address

properties.name: application.email.validate-addresses
properties.description: Whether or not to validate email addresses
